pageTitle: Unified Data- Tech IPO Date, Price, GMP, Review, Details
pageHeading: Unified Data- Tech Solutions Limited IPO (Unified Data- Tech IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 400 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: Hiren Rajendra Mehta Rajendra Kantilal Mehta and Harshaben Mehta are the promoters of the company.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Unified Data-Tech Solutions Private Limited (UDTechs) is a Mumbai-based IT service provider specializing in delivering innovative and customized technology solutions.

The company offers IT solutions, including data centers, virtualization, cybersecurity, and networking, serving industries like banking, finance, and IT. It works with clients to provide secure, cost-effective, high-performance solutions and support.

The company procures products and services for data centers, virtualization, cybersecurity, and secure application delivery. It is an authorized partner of OEMs, offering IT products, services, maintenance, and subscriptions.

The company has expanded its presence with branches in Pune and Ahmedabad, serving over 1,000 clients across India.

Services:

  • Technology Advisory Services: The company provides expert guidance to design custom IT infrastructure solutions, aligning with business goals. It offers architecture consultancy to ensure efficient, scalable, and cost-effective growth and performance optimization technologies.
  • System Integration:The company specializes in IT system integration, managing complex projects to deliver efficient, secure, and fully operational IT environments.
  • Expert Technical Services: The company offers specialized technical services for system migrations, upgrades, and re-engineering, ensuring smooth transitions for businesses undergoing digital transformation.

As on n March 31, 2025, the Company had employed 38 employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Robust Client Relationships and Diverse Clientele
  • Extensive and Reliable Delivery Network
  • Proven Track Record of Financial Success
  • Established relationships with suppliers
  • Seasoned Leadership and Skilled Workforce

contactDetails.full_address: Unified Data- Tech Solutions Limited, 701 7th Floor, Chintamani Avenue, Village Dindoshi Off Western Express Highway

faqs.question: What is the Unified Data- Tech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Unified Data- Tech IPO is a SME IPO of 5292000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹144.47 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹260 to ₹273 per share. The minimum order quantity is 400.

The IPO opens on May 22, 2025, and closes on May 26, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Unified Data- Tech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Unified Data- Tech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Unified Data- Tech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Unified Data- Tech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Unified Data- Tech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Unified Data- Tech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Unified Data- Tech IPO opens on May 22, 2025 and closes on May 26, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Unified Data- Tech IPO?
faqs.answer: Unified Data- Tech IPO lot size is 400, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,09,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Unified Data- Tech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Unified Data- Tech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Unified Data- Tech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Unified Data- Tech IPO will be done on Tuesday, May 27, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, May 28, 2025. Check the Unified Data- Tech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Unified Data- Tech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Unified Data- Tech IPO listing date is not yet announced. The tentative date of Unified Data- Tech IPO listing is Thursday, May 29, 2025.
